page.title: 05Education.
page.content: Included in our block is a very old Charity Primary School,this is in the village of Llangynog.It is not known when the school moved to its present location,however available Log Books tell us that it was pre 1872.There has been a school in the area since 1705. Today the school is a 40 children,2 teacher establishment.Eventhough the building is old the school is well equiped,for a school of its type. This is due to an extent to financial help from The John Vaughan's Charity.During the last four years some of the equipment paid for by the charity includes a B.B.C.computer with disk drive,an Epson L X 80 printer,a photocopier,an out door heavy duty climbing frame and a set of sport cloathing.The school is a V.C.P school and the children often wonder what John Vaughan would make of shool now.
